description: Text and URLs of hyperlinks from the text of several types of pages, others are in tables with the suffix '_embedded_links'

schema.name: count
schema.description: Number of occurrences of a link with the same URL and link-text in the same document

schema.name: url
schema.description: URL of a piece of static content on the www.gov.uk domain

schema.name: link_url_bare
schema.description: URL target of a hyperlink, omitting parameters and anchors

schema.name: link_text
schema.description: Plain text that is displayed in body of the URL
